title: Bloomberg Markets: Billion Dollar Future Possible for Hemp
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Billion Dollar Future Possible for Hemp
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Kate Krader Bloomberg Journalist Bloomberg Editorial Discussing entrepreneurs betting on a billion-dollar future for hemp. Thanks to new laws, hemp food products have the opportunity to become big business; now, two non-experts hope to create a new category.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
